channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'War of the Worlds' Isn’t Just Bad. It’s Also Shameless Tech Propaganda
item.description: By making Big Tech the hero in a movie about government surveillance, the dismally rated remake feels more like an ad for Amazon than anything else.

item.title: How we found TeaOnHer spilling users’ driver’s licenses in less than 10 minutes
item.description: Exclusive: A dating gossip app for men exposed thousands of users' personal data, including scans of driver's licenses. The app's developer, Xavier La...

item.title: Tony Robbins’ and Peter Diamandis’ longevity company Fountain Life raises $18M
item.description: The first principal of longevity is, “Don't die of anything stupid,” CEO Dr. William Kapp says. New funding will support mulit-state expansion.

item.title: Coffee Grinders Used to Be a Mystery. A New Device Might Solve It
item.description: Coffee grinders used to be a mystery, unless you knew someone at a lab. We used a new tool to analyze our top coffee grinder picks, and maybe make bet...

item.title: 6 Best Coffee Grinders For All Budgets, Tested & Approved (2025)
item.description: Get more joy from your java. These conical-burr, flat-burr, and bladed machines let you enjoy freshly ground beans in every cup.

item.title: Amazon rolls out same-day delivery of perishable groceries in 1,000 US cities
item.description: Shoppers can now order fresh grocery items, including produce, dairy, meat, seafood, baked goods, and more, alongside everyday household products, ele...

item.title: 10 Best Computer Monitors (2025): Budget, OLED, 4K
item.description: The Gear team spends countless hours in front of displays while writing for you. So we reviewed those too (including a few portable screens).

item.title: Apple dismisses Elon Musk’s claims that App Store favors OpenAI over other AI apps
item.description: The response comes after Musk threatened to sue Apple via xAI, claiming the iPhone maker was “behaving in a manner that makes it impossible for any AI...

item.title: Why I finally left Spotify
item.description: Spotify's dependence on algorithmic recommendations has gotten too suffocating.

item.title: Best Workout Headphones (2025), Tested In the Gym and Beyond
item.description: Rock your inner jock with a pair of sturdy, sweatproof, and tangle-proof headphones. Here are our favorites.
